item.title: G.O.P. Lawmakers in Syria Say They See Opportunity to Help Rebuild the Nation
item.description: Two Republican congressmen were expected to meet the country’s new leaders and to visit areas destroyed during the long civil war.

item.title: Rubio Says Trump to ‘Move On’ From Ukraine Peace Talks if No Progress Soon
item.description: “If it is not possible to end the war in Ukraine, we need to move on,” Secretary of State Marco Rubio said as he departed meetings in Paris.

item.title: Battling ‘Eat and Flee’ Tourists, Venice Brings Its Entrance Fee Back
item.description: A measure to limit day tourism on peak days began for the second year on Friday, charging day trippers five euros (or 10 for the spontaneous traveler)...

item.title: Cambodia and China Strengthen Ties as US Imposes Tariffs
item.description: China is the biggest foreign patron of Cambodia, where Mr. Xi concluded a tour of Southeast Asia. But the region also needs to curry favor with Presid...

item.title: Syrians Recount Gas Attack Under Assad as They Seek Justice
item.description: Syria’s ousted dictator, Bashar al-Assad, unleashed a Sarin gas strike on the suburbs of Damascus in 2013, killing at least 1,500. Now, the survivors ...
